Control Name: 5.12.1 There are tools and processes in place to grant just-in-time access.
Control Statement: Minimizing the number of people who have access to secure information or resources reduces the chance of a malicious actor gaining access or an authorized user inadvertently impacting a sensitive resource. For example, Azure AD Privileged Identity Management provides time-based and approval-based role activation to mitigate the risks of excessive, unnecessary, or misused access permissions on resources that you care about.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.12 What security controls do you have in place for access to Azure infrastructure?
